35 /* Authors: Robert Haschke
36  Desc: type traits for SFINAE-based templating
37 */
38 
39 #pragma once
40 
41 #include <type_traits>
42 
43 namespace moveit {
44 namespace task_constructor {
45 
46 // detect STL-like containers by presence of cbegin(), cend() methods
47 template <typename T, typename _ = void>
48 struct is_container : std::false_type
49 {};
50 
51 template <typename... Ts>
52 struct is_container_helper
53 {};
54 
55 template <typename T>
56 struct is_container<
57  T, std::conditional_t<false, is_container_helper<typename T::const_iterator, decltype(std::declval<T>().cbegin()),
58  decltype(std::declval<T>().cend())>,
59  void> > : public std::true_type
60 {};
61 } // namespace task_constructor
62 } // namespace moveit
